  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(Piece[][] board)
      Initializes the Board with a deep clone of the given parameter
      Parameters:
      board - 2D array of pieces, on which the Board should be based

    • Board

      public Board(String filePath)
      Parameters:
      filePath - The constructor parses the file at the given path and initializes the Board with its contents
      Throws:
      IllegalPiecePlacementException - if there is a piece at an illegal spot
      BoardFileAccessException - if the file at the specified path could not be accessed
      InvalidPieceStringException - if an invalid symbol was found while parsing the map
